title: 820-3115 no green light
message:
hi i have a1278 before i open the macbook was can on and can charge.
the main problem is when turning on after few seconds
can see the apple logo then suddenly shutdowns then
on automatically then shutdowns again, sometimes u need to turn on again.

found small corroded parts r5481 and r5482
also pin 7 8 U6100 after i clean this part (no parts from here damage)

now no green light but still can on with high fan with battery

no smc bypass mode on charger, on battery yes

testing on charger orig 65watts without battery
PPBUS_G3H 0.0V

u6900
pin 5 0.0V traces goin to j6900 pin5 is ok
pin 4 0.0V
pin 0.0V

checked and change dcin board and u6900 still no green light

u7000
resistance between 17-18 3.2 ohms
28-28 20.3 ohms

voltages:
1 15V
2. 16.4v
3. 3.8v
9. 0.0V
12. 3.4v
13. 3.4v
14. 0.0V
15. 0.0V
17. 0.0V
19. 0.0v
20. 0.0V
27. 15.7V

title: 820-3115 no green light
message:
"19. 0.0v
20. 0.0V"
Check diode mode to ground.
If good change U7000.

title: 820-3115 no green light
message:
Check SMC_RESET_L now.

"15. 12.2V"
I hope this is not true...

title: 820-3115 no green light
message:
Do you get 12MHz at Y5010?
Post its DC voltages, if you don't have o-scope, or frequency meter.

Did you try known good DCIN board?
Post U6900 voltages.

Check voltage and diode mode at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.
If something strange, disconnect BIL and test again.

Do you get 3V3_S5?

title: 820-3115 no green light
message:
Y5010
SMC_XTAL_R 1.2v 12MHz
SMC_EXTAL 1.1v stable using osci MHz is looping from random 1-2-4-40MHz

title: 820-3115 no green light
message: Please, check all mentioned in my previous post...
